translation.tappler_is_free_descr: tappler app offers free services listing, if you are individual or business owner, you too can list your services on the app with no cost whatsoever.
translation.all_what_you_need_descr: All what you need to do is to focus on growing your business and leave the customers on us. It is easy and simple.
translation.you_can_get_customers_descr: You can get customers from the first day you join tappler, build a strong profile and leave the rest on us
translation.create_an_account_to_join_descr: Create an account to join our growing network of service providers or login to your account
translation.choose_one_of_the_following_to_signin: Choose one of the following to sign in
translation.choose_one_of_the_following_to_sign_up: Choose one of the following to sign up
translation.we_could_not_log_you_descr: We could not log you in because your email Or password is not correct
translation.where_do_you_provide_your_service: Where do you provide your service?
translation.search_for_a_neighborhood_or_area: Search for a neighborhood or area
translation.verification_code_has_been_sent_to_email: Verification code has been sent to email address
translation.please_enter_the_verification_code_here: Please enter the verification code here
translation.choose_this_account_descr: Choose this account type if you do the work by yourself
translation.choose_this_account_business_descr: Choose this account type if you are a registered business
translation.type_your_first_and_last_name_descr: Type your first and last name as showing on your ID
translation.your_address_will_not_be_descr: Your address will not be shared with customers
translation.information_about_you_descr: Provide information about you and your services and why you are the best choice to perform this service. This Info may influence the customer when choosing the service providers. Mention the information that may be of interest to the customer, such as the nature of the services, quality of work, locations, speed of response etc..
translation.phone_numbers_or_emails_descr: Phone numbers or emails are not allowed in this area, it will be deleted.
translation.type_the_information_about_you_here: Type the information about you here
translation.example_descr_mock: This is an example of about me This is an example of about meThis is an example of about meThis is an example of about meThis is an example of about meThis is an example of about meThis is an example of about meThis is an example of about meThis is an example of about meThis is an example of about me This is an example of about meThis is an example of about meThis is an example of about me
translation.the_profile_photo_the_descr: The profile photo is the first thing the customers will see when they search for services. Here are some helpful tips To help you choose the best profile photo:
translation.make_sure_to_smile_descr: Make sure to smile in the photo, you will look great
translation.use_contrasting_colors_descr: Use contrasting colors and enough lighting
translation.promotional_photos_or_pictures_descr: Promotional photos or pictures are not allowed
